subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Bowling
lead_paragraph: Mr. Hardwick, the first of only six bowlers to win the sport’s triple crown, was a right-handed bowler with a fluid style, far smoother than many of today’s power players.
snippet: Mr. Hardwick, the first of only six bowlers to win the sport’s triple crown, was a right-handed bowler with a fluid style, far smoother than many of today’s power players.
